column4: i want to right click on file and change its permission to open as program but it saying i can not do it bcoz i m not owner, is there graphical way to fix this?
i went to folder where my file is, i right click on folder and opened terminal and typed sudo apt-get install <> file name will that do the trick
if you want to change the owner of the file, you need chown. If you want to make it executable, the command is chmod
if you read the man page for chmod, compose a proposed command line in a text editor I will be glad to explain where you went wrong
